array.string: When I say I know you,I mean I knew you yesterday. I do not know you actually now.
Wonders are many,and nothing is more wonderful then man.
The proper function of man is to live,but not to exist.
If you smile when one is around,you really mean it.
There is a time to speak and a time to be silent.
The worst bankrupt is the person who lost his enthusiasm.
It is awfully easy to be hard-boiled about everything in the daytime,but at night it is another thing.
To err is human,to forgive,divine.
There is an unconscious heeling process within the mind which mends up in spite of our desperate determination never to forget.
In this world there are only two tragedies. One is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
Naked came I into this world,and naked must I go out.
Passion,though a bad regulator,is a powerful spring.
Carve your name on hearts and not on marbles.
I can resist everything except temptation.
What is a man's first duty? The answer is brief: To be himself.
The love of country is the first virtue in a civilized man.
We can only love what we know and we can never know completely what we do not love.
A beautiful form is better than a beautiful face;a beautiful behavior than a beautiful form.
Man is，Properly speaking,based upon hope;he has no other posseession but hope.
Man must look just as ridiculous to the crab when it sees him walk forward.
All men whilst they are awake are in one common world;but each of them,when he is asleep,is in a world of his own.
Everyone is a moon,and has a dark side which he never shows in anybody.
Do not rejoice over anyone's death;remember that we all must die.
As long as any man exists,there is some need of him;let him fight for his own.
Repetition does not transform a lie into a truth.
The instinct of a man is to pursue everything that flies from him, and to fly from all that pursue him.
